text: Ani tumhi jara granthadharakanna sarva purave sadara karuna dyala, tarihi te tumacya kiblace anusarana karanara nahita ani na tumhi tyaca kibla man'ya karanare vhala, na he apasata ekamekanca kibla mananare aheta. Tumacyajavala spasta jnana ye'una pohocalyanantarahi jara tumhi tyancya iccha-akanksa purna karanyasathi tyance anusarana karu lagala tara niscitaca tumhidekhila atyacari tharala
